title: Saradomin priest

properties.value: Saradomin priests are found in the God Wars Dungeon. They are located in the main area and Saradomin's Encampment. Like their Spiritual mage-aligned counterpart, they attack using Saradomin Strike, except it doesn't drain the player's prayer points.

Saradomin priests are found in the God Wars Dungeon. They are located in the main area and Saradomin's Encampment. Like their Spiritual mage-aligned counterpart, they attack using Saradomin Strike, except it doesn't drain the player's prayer points.

They are not usually aggressive to other monsters.

  • 2 Drops

Clue scroll (hard)11/128[d 1][1]Not sold12
  1. ↑ The hard clue scroll drop rate increases to 1/121 with the completion of the hard combat achievements.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
8 August 2019
(update)

The drop rate for ecumenical keys have been changed to be 1/60 regardless of keys owned.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Saradomin priests will use Magic against players, but will use a weak Ranged attack with a max hit of 1 when fighting other monsters. As a result, they often remain in combat until killed.
  • His appearance seems to be based on a Quaker or a Puritan.

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Tide's Twitter account. 24 May 2019. (Archived from the original on 24 May 2019.) Mod Tide: "I know its been a while since the clue expansion but here is the information on clue scroll drop rates and loot chances! If anything changes I will keep you posted."

'''Saradomin priests''' are found in the [[God Wars Dungeon]]. They are located in the main area and [[Saradomin's Encampment]]. Like their [[Spiritual mage]]-aligned counterpart, they attack using [[Saradomin Strike]], except it doesn't drain the player's [[Prayer|prayer points]].

They are not usually [[Aggressiveness|aggressive]] to other monsters.

==Trivia==
*Saradomin priests will use Magic against players, but will use a weak Ranged attack with a max hit of 1 when fighting other monsters. As a result, they often remain in combat until killed.
*His appearance seems to be based on a [[wikipedia:Quaker|Quaker]] or a [[wikipedia:Puritan|Puritan]].
